Title: Relates to owner liability for failure to stop at a stop sign or yield for a pedestrian
Summary: Authorizes a municipality to adopt a local law or ordinance to establish a program imposing monetary liability on the owner of a vehicle for failure of an operator to install and operate stop sign and pedestrian crossing photo violation monitoring systems.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the public officers law, in relation to owner liability for failure to stop at a stop sign or yield for a pedestrian
